attributes.action: Marine A "First Soldier since WW2 is convicted of murder in battle"
attributes.additional_details:
"Unnamed Marine faces life in jail for shooting dead injured Taliban prisoner"

This is an absolute disgrace that "Marine A" faces jail. Think about the families that have lost a loved one in the war...

In the words of our Prince Harry "Take a life to save a life" Marine A was merely following an royal order therefore needs to be exonerated of all crimes committed immediately,
